name: General Supplies Company
description:
Make money by selling diferent things to different people in a quest-styled way.

Click on the different icons to:

Buy materials from the store, craft them into new items, and sell them to the specific person.

There are 10 quests, 3 can be done more than once.

The game is intended to be updated with more quests and items as time goes, make sure to stay turned.
